species.name: tentacool
descriptions: As it floats along on the waves, it uses its toxic feelers to stab anything it touches.
Because its body is almost entirely composed of water, it shrivels up if it is washed ashore.
Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.
It can sometimes be found all dry and shriveled up on a beach. Toss it back into the sea to revive it.
It drifts aimlessly in waves. Very difficult to see in water, it may not be noticed until it stings.

abilities.name: clear-body
abilities.effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pok√©mon.

abilities.name: liquid-ooze
abilities.effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

abilities.name: rain-dish
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.
